snippet.title: LAZARETTO: Steam Trailer - Survival Horror Game - Horror ghost paranormal video game trailer
snippet.description:
NEW for Android: https://bit.ly/2Pz9UtQ 
iOS (iPhone and iPad): http://apple.co/2Ldrz9X
Play on Steam (Mac/PC): http://goo.gl/Hv72yJ

LAZARETTO is a unique and immersive first-person survival horror game set in the current day. It puts you in the shoes of an urban explorer, whose investigation of an abandoned quarantine island turns into a strange and dangerous adventure.

DOWN THE RABBIT HOLE
Lazaretto is a game for those who enjoy getting lost in mysteries. Chapter 1 teases you with strange and unusual events. Not everything is explained, so we welcome interpretations and theories.

COMBAT-FREE GAMEPLAY
Explore the grounds of the Lazaretto without any weapons. Avoid or outsmart dangerous adversaries using only your wits and a flashlight to see.

MYSTERY
What happened before the grounds suddenly closed down in 1922? Discover bits and pieces of forgotten artifacts to reveal a dark and dramatic past. 

CREATURES
Unique creatures modeled by Fabrizio Bortolussi (District 9, Silent Hill film) and animated by Dhaval Soni (GTA5)

ATMOSPHERIC HORROR
The decaying environment coupled with eerie, atmospheric sound design creates an immersive horror experience.

PHENOMENA
We explore unexpected findings in our own physical world, the mysteries of supernatural phenomena, and the inner-horrors of the subconscious mind. 

PUZZLES
Puzzles are presented organically as storytelling mechanisms, appropriate to the environment.

. . . . . . . . . . 

FOLLOW US

http://www.twitter.com/LazarettoGame
http://www.LazarettoGame.com

Genre: Survival Horror
Platform: PC, Mac, Mobile
Developer: Iron Monkey
